issue.title: [IR] Remove RelBase
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14349](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14349). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Based on conversations with the folks at DuckDB working on this PR (https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/pull/2331) and our own consumer implementation `RelBase` isn't very useful. We should remove it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14349?focusedCommentId=17433065) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11435
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11435>
